questions.question_text: When the Notify End Users policy setting is turned on, which of the following is TRUE?

choices.C: End-users receive a pop-up notification when a prevention action occurs
choices.D: End users will receive a pop-up allowing them to confirm or refuse a pending quarantine
choices.B: End users will be immediately notified via a pop-up that their machine is in-network isolation
choices.A: End users will not be notified as we would not want to notify a malicious actor of a detection. This setting does not exist
